space.arim.api.platform.spigot

Class SpigotMessages

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.platform.AbstractPlatformMessages<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>
      • space.arim.api.platform.bungee.BungeeMessages
        • space.arim.api.platform.spigot.SpigotMessages
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormattingManipulator, PlatformFormattingParser<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>, PlatformMessageConverter<net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[]>

    public class SpigotMessages
extends BungeeMessages
    Spigot messages utility. Use get() to get the instance.

    Since Spigot uses the same chat API as BungeeCord, see BungeeMessages for all documentation.
    Author:
    A248

      • transformFormattingCodes

        public String transformFormattingCodes(String msg)
        Shortcut to convert '&' formatting codes to 'ยง' codes.
        Equivalent to SpigotMessages.get().transformFormattingCodes(msg, FormattingCodePattern.get(), 'ยง');
        Parameters:
        msg - the source message
        Returns:
        the same message with '&' codes translated
